blog.name: boutardieu
blog.title: The Parmenides Parlor
blog.description:
Subculture is to culture what mustard is to mayonnaise : you theoretically don't need it, but without it, you have 90% chances to end up with a bland and mushy porridge you'd rather shoot yourself in the head than use.

Plus... Come on, guys. It's mustard.

summary: Todoroki Shouto : Aoyama is so fuckin' SHADY, I swear... sometimes he insults me and I only realize it, like, ten hours...
body:
Todoroki Shouto : Aoyama is so fuckin' SHADY, I swear... sometimes he insults me and I only realize it, like, ten hours later.
Bakugou Katsuki : Well that lil' French bitch better not insult ME.
Aoyama Yuuga : Moi? Non, non, non, Monsieur Bakugou, never. In fact, I assure you that no one in this class could possibly think less of you than you do.
Bakugou Katsuki : Good.
Bakugou Katsuki : [ten hours later] ...wait.

dialogue.name: Todoroki Shouto
dialogue.label: Todoroki Shouto :
dialogue.phrase: Aoyama is so fuckin' SHADY, I swear... sometimes he insults me and I only realize it, like, ten hours later.

body:
Day 17:

This is my present to my dear friend @imabe-liva ! Ima is another artist who was purged and had to remake another blog. But even with all this chaos, their constant improvement never ceases to amaze me.

Ima, you truly are an inspiration. I hope you know that. 💕

blog.name: bnhagalposts
blog.title: Bnha Headcannons and Match-ups
blog.description: Hello, Guys, Gals, and Non-binary pals! Welcome to my humble Bnha Headcanons and Match-ups! REQUESTS ARE CURRENTLY OPEN BUT, I'M ONLY TAKING HEADCANONS RIGHT NOW!!! Thank you!

summary: Hi can i request a reverse of your reader dating Deku and being part of the bakusquad? Reader dating Bakugou but being part of...
question: Hi can i request a reverse of your reader dating Deku and being part of the bakusquad? Reader dating Bakugou but being part of the dekusquad? It was really good and cute.
answer:
-Oh no. Why did Bakugou fall for a dekusquad member? Why is he dating a deku squad member? Maybe because of their dumb, happy smile, their ability to put up with his anger and even managed to calm him down.

-His relationship with the beautiful (Name) has caused a rift in the bakusquad. The members very disappointed in his actions and had a vote to change the name of bakusquad to minasquad, yeah it didn’t pass since Bakugou’s quirk almost exploded the classroom when they suggested that.

-The dekusquad members took the news with the most ease, it was peaceful when (Name) told them and then they went back to discussing heroes. I mean sure Uraraka made a comment of why she’s dating an ‘angry pomeranian’ but, was at the very least happy that her friend was happy.

-The dekusquad was very impressed when (Name) managed to call Bakugou ‘Kacchan’ and survived, surprisingly he just blushed and called her a cute idiot. Okay that convinced the dekusquad that Bakugou was truly in love (Name).

-Though our next problem arose, (Name) was invited on the same day to hang out with the bakusquad or the dekusquad. Her boyfriend or he best friends. Shoot, (Name) was screwed. Since she promised to buy Uraraka this really tasty crepe at the mall and watch a new hero movie with the rest of her squad but, the bakusquad wanted to take her to an amusement park.

-She ended up at an amusement park, holding a cotton candy and actual ccraziness. Gosh she loved her boyfriend but, him attempting to fight a employee that worked this one ride because she got sick, was a bit much.

-Cut to Mina screeching at Kaminari because he kept failing those rigged games to win a stuffed animal. Sero and Kirishima waiting in a massive line to ride the most craziest ride she’s ever scene and now (Name) was awkwardly alone. Her phone buzzed.

-FloatyBoaty: Ferris wheel kiss or you owe me more crepes!

-(Name): Ah Chako I’m still sorry about missing out on the hangout at the mall.

-FloatyBoaty: No problems! Having fun????

-(Name): I mean does watching bakubabe yell at an employee count as fun???

-FloatyBoaty:  wow what a gentleman

-(Name): oh wait he’s stopped, bye

-Bakugou finally stopped and grumbly apologized to (Name) that he was being a bit of angry boyfriend. The bakusquad laughed in the background. (Name) managed to convince her lover to go on the ferris wheel since the line was short and also a pair of puppy eyes worked as well.

-Bakugou and her sat on the ferris wheel and (Name) looked down and saw the bakusquad taking pictures below and Bakugou flipped them off, what a beautiful friendship Bakugou and his friends had. At the top, she gave a thumbs up to the bakusquad which they managed to saw.

-(Name) smiled and held Katsuki’s cheeks in her hands and kissed him, to which Katsuki returned.

-Cut to after the amusement park and (Name) holding at least 15 stuffed animals Katsuki won. (Name) looked down to her phone and witness the bakusquad and dekusquad joined together in a text conversation.

-The picture of her kissing Katsuki ended up in the new group chat and it flooded with texts of a proud Uraraka, Izuku awkwardly being proud of Katsuki for accepting a kiss, Iida congratulating for them being a loving couple, Denki accidentally adding Bakugou to the group chat and now the conversation ended up with way to many swears and insults to everyone else.

-Wow, who knew the two warring squads would join together in a joyous occasion to spread pictures of Katsuki being a great boyfriend and the two sharing ice cream together.

-Next day of school, Aizawa was actually impressed that the squads weren’t fighting all until Bakugou blew up at least 9 desks, screeched at everyone who passed him, Aizawa went to Nedzu and asked for a raise.


I hope you enjoyed and have a great day! P.s. both bakugou dating a dekusquad member and deku dating a bakusquad member were very fun to write!

Ophelia

blog.name: katsudekufanficrec
blog.title: katsudeku fanfic rec
blog.description: All my KatsuDeku fanfic recommendations in one place! Feel free to ask for a list or leave your own recommendation! Click here to check all tags!

summary: Online Relationship List 3am by onionstories It looks like SATSU is open to visitors! Would you like to travel there right now?...
body:
Online Relationship List

3am by onionstories

It looks like SATSU is open to visitors! Would you like to travel there right now?

When Izuku got to the other town, the first thing he noticed was its flag. It seemed to be… explosion themed? It reminded him of Kacchan!

People are different when anonymous- or when believed to be- and Katsuki Bakugo was no exception. It was alright for him to be a little different, a little more open- after all, what was there to lose?

Izuku runs into the most unexpected person while playing Animal Crossing in the wee hours of the morning, and inadvertently unearths sides of Kacchan that he’d swore would never see the light of day.

[Mature - 6/? Chapters - Getting Together]

Not Who You Think by SinaBrosLN

Who knew one simple photo of you and your best friend could have your crush messaging you, asking for you to date them! It was too good to be true!

A story where Katsuki thinks Izuku is the cute girl in his profile photo and not the nerdy guy with messy hair.

[Explicit - 4/? Chapters - Omegaverse]

to you, on the other side of the screen by stars_go_dim

Bakugou is a popular YouTuber when he suddenly stumbles upon Midoriya’s makeup channel. But why is he so interested in some random kid he found on YouTube?

or alternatively

that YouTube au nobody asked for

[Teen and Up Audiences - 7/? Chapters]

We are Live by Polarbeater

Katsuki makes a living by streaming himself playing video games. He’s spent a long time gathering a popular fanbase behind him so how does this newcomer get just as popular as him so much faster? Maybe he has more experience streaming than his fans think.

or

Streamer Katsuki and rival Izuku who also secretly doubles as a camboy.

[Explicit - 1/? Chapters]

Call Accepted by Attack_Of_The_Flying_Dekus

When the screen was clear of lag and static, Katsuki looked at the screen… and froze. The boy was an angel. A halo of green hair sat atop his round face, the curls framing wide eyes and freckled cheeks. The boy on the screen gaped at him for a moment, his mouth parted in a soft ‘o’ before he gave a sweet smile that made Katsuki’s heart beat faster.

”H-hi, Kacchan.”

[Mature - 8/10 Chapters]

A Demolition Boy & his Cryptid BF by kewltie

Bakugou of the Demolition Squad is famous for running one of the most popular Youtube channels on the web that regularly blow shit up and jumped off a perfectly good building for shit and giggles. He’s also famous for his Cryptid BF™, never appearing on camera except for a few bodyshots and all information on him is kept locked up tighter than Fort Knox, therefore drawing all sort of attention and curiosity toward his mysterious boyfriend.

Deku from Deku Explains is a hopeless chatterbox who is known for uploading 20-30 minutes video that talked about his favorite shows and comics and have one of the most devoted following on Youtube. He also can’t seem to shut up about his boyfriend Kacchan, who regularly make his presence on the channel as a disembodied voice.

They should theoretically have nothing in common except a shared platform to host their content and an army of fans with an endless curiosity and devotion to their Youtubers. Vidcon is where we lay our scene and the internet is about to get a rude wake up call.

[Teen and Up Audiences - One-shot]

How It’s Supposed to Be by ceruleaneyes

It was hard enough to have your best friend living miles and miles away, but it only gets worse when you start having feelings for them.

[Not Rated - 1/? Chapters]

Marriage Quest by Kitastrophe

For Izuku, being one of the top Symbol of Peace players certainly has it’s perks — but even that quickly comes crashing down when the number one player in Japan approaches him with an… unusual proposal.

***

‘LORD EXPLOSION MURDER HERE. DON’T EVEN THINK ABOUT SENDING A FRIEND REQUEST OR ASKING TO FIGHT ME UNLESS YOU’VE ACTUALLY GOT SKILL. OH, AND ALSO, I WON’T EVER REVEAL MY IDENTITY WHILE PLAYING THIS SHIT OF A GAME, SO STOP ASKING. I USE VOICE MODULATORS AND COVER MY FACE DURING COMPETITIONS BECAUSE BEING ANONYMOUS MAKES ME FEEL POWERFUL AND IT’S GREAT. GOOD LUCK TRYING TO FIND OUT WHO I AM, THOUGH. YOU WON’T.’

Izuku squints at his monitor. Isn’t that interesting.

[Teen and Up Audiences - 3/? Chapters - College]

I hope you all enjou it!

[Mature - 6/? Chapters - Getting Together]

Not Who You Think by SinaBrosLN

Who knew one simple photo of you and your best friend could have your crush messaging you, asking for you to date them! It was too good to be true!

A story where Katsuki thinks Izuku is the cute girl in his profile photo and not the nerdy guy with messy hair.

[Explicit - 4/? Chapters - Omegaverse]

to you, on the other side of the screen by stars_go_dim

Bakugou is a popular YouTuber when he suddenly stumbles upon Midoriya’s makeup channel. But why is he so interested in some random kid he found on YouTube?

or alternatively

that YouTube au nobody asked for

[Teen and Up Audiences - 7/? Chapters]

We are Live by Polarbeater

Katsuki makes a living by streaming himself playing video games. He’s spent a long time gathering a popular fanbase behind him so how does this newcomer get just as popular as him so much faster? Maybe he has more experience streaming than his fans think.

or

Streamer Katsuki and rival Izuku who also secretly doubles as a camboy.

[Explicit - 1/? Chapters]

Call Accepted by Attack_Of_The_Flying_Dekus

When the screen was clear of lag and static, Katsuki looked at the screen… and froze. The boy was an angel. A halo of green hair sat atop his round face, the curls framing wide eyes and freckled cheeks. The boy on the screen gaped at him for a moment, his mouth parted in a soft ‘o’ before he gave a sweet smile that made Katsuki’s heart beat faster.

”H-hi, Kacchan.”

[Mature - 8/10 Chapters]

A Demolition Boy & his Cryptid BF by kewltie

Bakugou of the Demolition Squad is famous for running one of the most popular Youtube channels on the web that regularly blow shit up and jumped off a perfectly good building for shit and giggles. He’s also famous for his Cryptid BF™, never appearing on camera except for a few bodyshots and all information on him is kept locked up tighter than Fort Knox, therefore drawing all sort of attention and curiosity toward his mysterious boyfriend.

Deku from Deku Explains is a hopeless chatterbox who is known for uploading 20-30 minutes video that talked about his favorite shows and comics and have one of the most devoted following on Youtube. He also can’t seem to shut up about his boyfriend Kacchan, who regularly make his presence on the channel as a disembodied voice.

They should theoretically have nothing in common except a shared platform to host their content and an army of fans with an endless curiosity and devotion to their Youtubers. Vidcon is where we lay our scene and the internet is about to get a rude wake up call.

[Teen and Up Audiences - One-shot]

How It’s Supposed to Be by ceruleaneyes

It was hard enough to have your best friend living miles and miles away, but it only gets worse when you start having feelings for them.

[Not Rated - 1/? Chapters]

Marriage Quest by Kitastrophe

For Izuku, being one of the top Symbol of Peace players certainly has it’s perks — but even that quickly comes crashing down when the number one player in Japan approaches him with an… unusual proposal.

***

‘LORD EXPLOSION MURDER HERE. DON’T EVEN THINK ABOUT SENDING A FRIEND REQUEST OR ASKING TO FIGHT ME UNLESS YOU’VE ACTUALLY GOT SKILL. OH, AND ALSO, I WON’T EVER REVEAL MY IDENTITY WHILE PLAYING THIS SHIT OF A GAME, SO STOP ASKING. I USE VOICE MODULATORS AND COVER MY FACE DURING COMPETITIONS BECAUSE BEING ANONYMOUS MAKES ME FEEL POWERFUL AND IT’S GREAT. GOOD LUCK TRYING TO FIND OUT WHO I AM, THOUGH. YOU WON’T.’

Izuku squints at his monitor. Isn’t that interesting.

[Teen and Up Audiences - 3/? Chapters - College]

I hope you all enjou it!

trail.content_raw:
Online Relationship List

3am by onionstories

It looks like SATSU is open to visitors! Would you like to travel there right now?

When Izuku got to the other town, the first thing he noticed was its flag. It seemed to be… explosion themed? It reminded him of Kacchan!

People are different when anonymous- or when believed to be- and Katsuki Bakugo was no exception. It was alright for him to be a little different, a little more open- after all, what was there to lose?

Izuku runs into the most unexpected person while playing Animal Crossing in the wee hours of the morning, and inadvertently unearths sides of Kacchan that he’d swore would never see the light of day.

[Mature - 6/? Chapters - Getting Together]

Not Who You Think by SinaBrosLN

Who knew one simple photo of you and your best friend could have your crush messaging you, asking for you to date them! It was too good to be true!
